title: Question for Riot
body:
What makes a champion good enough to take from boards and put into design team, for use of the players, what are the requirements of a good (not OP) champ

inb4 i probably shoulda asked this before i did my 7 day champ concept thing XD

replies.body:
NA Board has people washing it with champ designs, there are a LOT of champ design concept floating out there. 

However,

To get ideas good enough for it to be made into an actual champ, I would imagine 
1. You will need to be well cultured enough to take notes from multiple culture and sub cultures, 
2. With no completely out of the blue spell mechanics (stays somewhat in line with other champs), 
3. A coherent background lore that fits in the Runeterra universe and predetermined roles, albeit vague and shouldn't be the very center of balance, 
4. Proposed synergies with other champs in a meaningful way, 
5. Also the champ has to have a kit that fits gameplay and theme wise.
6. Don't make overloaded kit, slightly can be ok but not full on overload.

There is a trend that people seem to make their champ as overloaded as possible for whatever reason, make sure not to make that mistake.
